about_the_game:
TattooVR is an immersive art experience that brings the ancient art of tattooing into the cutting edge of VR.

In TattooVR, you can freely design tattoos on other characters' bodies as if their skin is your canvas, letting you create custom art with a stunningly realistic feel.

While it's fun to start by sketching on the default characters, TattooVR also supports VRM-format avatars, so you can upload your favorite characters and design one-of-a-kind tattoos just for them.

With robust save and load features, any textures you create can be reused, and modifying VRM characters is easy and intuitive.

Designed for worldwide accessibility, TattooVR uses a simple pictogram-based interface without any text, making it easy and intuitive for users from all over the world to enjoy.

A detailed official tutorial video is available, so even beginners can dive right in with confidence.

Express your unique blend of tradition and creativity in VR, and discover the limitless potential of art in an entirely new dimension with TattooVR!

In TattooVR, you can freely design tattoos on other characters' bodies as if their skin is your canvas, letting you create custom art with a stunningly realistic feel.

While it's fun to start by sketching on the default characters, TattooVR also supports VRM-format avatars, so you can upload your favorite characters and design one-of-a-kind tattoos just for them.

With robust save and load features, any textures you create can be reused, and modifying VRM characters is easy and intuitive.

Designed for worldwide accessibility, TattooVR uses a simple pictogram-based interface without any text, making it easy and intuitive for users from all over the world to enjoy.

A detailed official tutorial video is available, so even beginners can dive right in with confidence.

name: TattooVR

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4590
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR－HTC Vive Cosmos、HTC Vive、Oculus CV1、Meta Quest 2、Oculus Rift S
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4590
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • VR Support: OpenXR－HTC Vive Cosmos、HTC Vive、Oculus CV1、Meta Quest 2、Oculus Rift S

short_description: TattooVR is an immersive art experience that brings the ancient art of tattooing into the cutting edge of VR. TattooVR also supports VRM-format avatars, so you can upload your favorite characters and design one-of-a-kind tattoos just for them.
supported_languages: English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese
